topic.title: ZeroMe and registering a username
topic.body: A few weeks ago I created a username with ZeroMe, today I went to use it and I could not find the login only new registration. Does ZeroMe only keep usernames for the session then when we return we create another? Or is there some place to login?

1_1GuYKebkQAqGJ4tNpNp4TD1UuoHHudCJLA.body: No one is beyond redemption. Everyone is capable of positive change. Beating them up won't help, it takes a loving, supportive community. So long as you are clear that we do not support any touching of children, watching others touch children, no possessing or viewing child porn, then I can be supportive and would seed
